title: Matteo Jorgenson almost hits Tour de France jackpot: ‘I had to play my hand early’
content:
The American on Movistar comes up 500 yards short of winning on one of the most famous climbs on the Tour de France: 'I am happy with the risk I took.'

Read the full article at Matteo Jorgenson almost hits Tour de France jackpot: ‘I had to play my hand early’ on Velo.
author: ahood
